Articles.Content:
Alright I consider myself non-modded because I have only KER, Mechjeb (never use it )  RCS build aid and planetshine and kerbal alarm clock.. I do not consider myself  heavily modded which is why I posted here instead of in the modded installs. So I open up KSP, click on "Start game". Then I click on continue and click on a save. It starts loading up: Loading, then Kerbal alarm clock appears and the timewarp bar and other stuff. Then it stops working and I have to close it.

So has this happened to anyone else? Do I restart my computer? Is my game broken?

(Also sorry if this is in the wrong place)

Forget I said anything. It works now. I never posted here!

Edited August 4, 2016 by Firemetal
